description.en:
Guide for people who want to learn scanlation.  
  
Will be expanded slowlyâ€¦ These are effort :/  
  
Feel free to add your own guides if you have a different way of doing something.  
  
[Actions](https://mangadex.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/Bocchi-Sensei%20Actions.atn) Just drop it into Photoshop to add them to it.  
[Topaz Plug-in](https://mangadex.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/Topaz%20Clean) Add .zip to end after you download it.  
[Keyboard shortcuts](https://mangadex.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/Keyboard%20Shortcuts%20Primary.psp) Needs to be placed in \Users\YourName\AppData\Roaming\Adobe\Adobe Photoshop CC 2018\Adobe Photoshop CC 2018 Settings\ folder for it to work.
